Posts.Content: Jul 15, 2012 02:31PM Pollyann wrote: I had a core needle biopsy this past Thursday. I go tomorrow for the results. Waiting is truly the hardest part. Keep yourself busy to keep your mind off it. Also, try not to Google anything. It will only scare you more. Keep in mind that 80% turn out not being BC.  Good Luck!
